author: vgeorgescu

other than svn_diff_file_ignore_space_none before doing any normalization.

author: dlr
msg: JavaHL: Allow specified tests to be invoked, by passing in

invocation which runs the test suite.
explicitly specified test methods in lieu of the default test
decl specifier, which is causing compilation problems with Mac OS

constructor, both of which delegate to super-class, and invoke
(init): Factored out of old no-args constructor.
(BasicTests): Add explicit no-args and String constructors which
delegate to super-class, and invoke init().
(init): Factored out of old no-args constructor.
